entry.title: Pat_1002ï¼ˆç”²çº§ï¼‰
entry.content:
1002 A+B for Polynomials ï¼ˆ25 åˆ†) åŸæ–‡åœ°å€

This time, you are supposed to find A+B where A and B are two polynomials.

Input Specification:

Each input file contains one test case. Each case occupies 2 lines, and each line contains the information of a polynomial: K Nâ€‹1â€‹â€‹ aâ€‹Nâ€‹1â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹ Nâ€‹2â€‹â€‹ aâ€‹Nâ€‹2â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹ â€¦ Nâ€‹Kâ€‹â€‹ aâ€‹Nâ€‹Kâ€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹ where K is the number of nonzero terms in the polynomial, Nâ€‹iâ€‹â€‹ and aâ€‹Nâ€‹iâ€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹ (i=1,2,â‹¯,K) are the exponents and coefficients, respectively. It is given that 1â‰¤Kâ‰¤10ï¼Œ0â‰¤Nâ€‹Kâ€‹â€‹<â‹¯<Nâ€‹2â€‹â€‹<Nâ€‹1â€‹â€‹â‰¤1000.

Output Specification:

For each test case you should output the sum of A and B in one line, with the same format as the input. Notice that there must be NO extra space at the end of each line. Please be accurate to 1 decimal place.

Sample Input:

2 1 2.4 0 3.22 2 1.5 1 0.5

Sample Output:

3 2 1.5 1 2.9 0 3.2

ä»£ç ï¼š

entry.title: Pat_1001ï¼ˆç”²çº§ï¼‰
entry.content:
1001 A+B Format ï¼ˆ20 åˆ†) åŸæ–‡åœ°å€

Calculate a+b and output the sum in standard format â€“ that is, the digits must be separated into groups of three by commas (unless there are less than four digits).

Input Specification:

Each input file contains one test case. Each case contains a pair of integers a and b where âˆ’10â€‹6â€‹â€‹â‰¤a,bâ‰¤10â€‹6â€‹â€‹. The numbers are separated by a space.

Output Specification:

For each test case, you should output the sum of a and b in one line. The sum must be written in the standard format.

Sample Input:

-1000000 9

Sample Output:

-999,991

sort.hå¤´æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š
#ifndef SORT_H_INCLUDED
#define SORT_H_INCLUDED
#include
#include
using namespace std;

enum ErrorType
{invalidArraySize, memoryAllocationError, indexOutOfRange};
char errorMsg[] =
{
â€œInvalid array sizeâ€, â€œMemory allocation errorâ€,
â€œInvalid index: â€œ
};
template
class Array
{
private:
T alist;
int size;
void Error(ErrorType error,int badIndex=0) const;
public:
Array(int sz = 50);
Array(const Array& A);
Array(void);
Array& operator= (const Array& rhs);
T& operator[](int i);
operator T* (void) const;
int ListSize(void) const;
void Resize(int sz);
void InsertionSort();
void SelectionSort();
void BubbleSort();
int SeqSearch(T key);
};
template
void Array::Error(ErrorType error, int badIndex) const
{
cerr << errorMsg[error];
if (error == indexOutOfRange)
cerr << badIndex;
cerr << endl;
exit(1);
}
template
Array::Array(int sz)
{
if (sz <= 0)
Error(invalidArraySize);
size = sz;
alist = new T[size];
if (alist == NULL)
Error(memoryAllocationError);
}
template
Array::Array(void)
{
delete [] alist;
}
template
Array::Array(const Array& X)
{
int n = X.size;
size = n;
alist = new T[n];
if (alist == NULL)
Error(memoryAllocationError);
T* srcptr = X.alist;
T* destptr = alist;
while (nâ€“)
*destptr++ = *srcptr++;
}
template
Array& Array::operator= (const Array& rhs)
{
int n = rhs.size;
if (size != n)
{
delete [] alist;
alist = new T[n];
if (alist == NULL)
Error(memoryAllocationError);
size = n;
}
T* destptr = alist;
T* srcptr = rhs.alist;
while (nâ€“)
*destptr++ = *srcptr++;
return this;
}
template
T& Array::operator[] (int n)
{
if (n < 0 || n > size-1)
Error(indexOutOfRange,n);
return alist[n];
}
template
Array::operator T (void) const
{
return alist;
}
template
int Array::ListSize(void) const
{
return size;
}
template
void Array::Resize(int sz)
{
if (sz <= 0)
Error(invalidArraySize);
if (sz == size)
return;
T* newlist = new T[sz];
if (newlist == NULL)
Error(memoryAllocationError);
int n = (sz <= size) ? sz : size;
T* srcptr = alist;
T* destptr = newlist;
while (nâ€“)
*destptr++ = *srcptr++;
delete[] alist;
alist = newlist;
size = sz;
}
template
void Array::InsertionSort()
{
int i, j;
T temp;
for (i = 1; i < size; i++)
{
j = i;
temp = alist[i];
while (j > 0 && temp < alist[j-1])
{
alist[j] = alist[j-1];
jâ€“;
}
alist[j] = temp;
}
}
template
void Array::SelectionSort()
{
int smallIndex;
int i, j;
for (i = 0; i < size-1; i++)
{
smallIndex = i;
for (j = i+1; j < size; j++)
if (alist[j] < alist[smallIndex])
smallIndex = j;
swap(alist[i], alist[smallIndex]);
}
}
template
void Swap (T &x, T &y)
{
T temp;
temp = x;
x = y;
y = temp;
}
template
void Array::BubbleSort()
{
int i,j;
int lastExchangeIndex;
i = size-1;
while (i > 0)
{
lastExchangeIndex = 0;
for (j = 0; j < i; j++)
if (alist[j+1] < alist[j])
{
Swap(alist[j],alist[j+1]);
lastExchangeIndex = j;
}
i = lastExchangeIndex;
}
}
template
int Array::SeqSearch(T key)
{
for(int i=0;i < size;i++)
if (alist[i] == key)
return i;
return -1;
}

#endif // SORT_H_INCLUDED

#include
#include
#include <time.h>
#include <windows.h>
#include â€œSort.hâ€
using namespace std;
int main()
{
Array A(10);
int i,k;
int SearchNum;

#ifndef QUEUE_CLASS
#define QUEUE_CLASS
#include
#include
#include â€œLinkedList.hâ€

using namespace std;

template
class Queue
{
private:
LinkedList queueList;
public:
Queue(void);
void QInsert(const T& elt);
T QDelete(void);
T QFront(void);
int QLength(void) const;
int QEmpty(void) const;
void QClear(void);
};
template
Queue::Queue(void)
{}
template
int Queue::QLength(void) const
{
return queueList.ListSize();
}
template
int Queue::QEmpty(void) const
{
return queueList.ListEmpty();
}
template
void Queue::QClear(void)
{
queueList.ClearList();
}
template
void Queue::QInsert(const T& elt)
{
queueList.InsertRear(elt);
}
template
T Queue::QDelete(void)
{
if (queueList.ListEmpty())
{
cerr << â€œCalling QDelete for an empty queue!â€ << endl;
exit(1);
}
return queueList.DeleteFront();
}
template
T Queue::QFront(void)
{
if (queueList.ListEmpty())
{
cerr << â€œCalling QFront for an empty queue!â€ << endl;
exit(1);
}
queueList.Reset();
return queueList.Data();
}
#endif

{
Queue A;

{

A.QInsert(a);
}

cout << â€œæ˜¾ç¤ºé˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­çš„æ‰€æœ‰å…ƒç´ ä¸ºï¼šâ€ ;
while(!A.QEmpty())
{
cout << A.QFront() << â€œ â€œ;
A.QDelete();
}
cout<<endl;
cout<<â€åˆ¤æ–­é˜Ÿåˆ—æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©ºï¼šâ€<<(A.QEmpty()==0?â€ä¸ºç©ºâ€:â€ä¸ä¸ºç©ºâ€)<<endl;
cout << endl;
cout<<â€å¼€å§‹æ¸…ç©ºé˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼â€<<endl;
A.QClear();
cout<<â€é˜Ÿåˆ—æˆåŠŸæ¸…ç©ºï¼â€<<endl;
return 0;
}

entry.content:
è¿™é‡Œä½¿ç”¨ID3ç®—æ³•åˆ’åˆ†æ•°æ®é›†ã€‚ ID3ç®—æ³•çš„ä¼ªä»£ç ï¼š ID3ï¼ˆä¾‹å­ï¼Œç›®æ ‡å±æ€§ï¼Œå±æ€§ï¼‰ ä¸ºæ ‘åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹ å¦‚æœæ‰€æœ‰ç¤ºä¾‹éƒ½æ˜¯è‚¯å®šçš„ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›å•èŠ‚ç‚¹æ ‘Rootï¼Œå…¶ä¸­label = +ã€‚ å¦‚æœæ‰€æœ‰ç¤ºä¾‹å‡ä¸ºè´Ÿæ•°ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›å•èŠ‚ç‚¹æ ‘Rootï¼Œæ ‡ç­¾ä¸º - ã€‚ å¦‚æœé¢„æµ‹å±æ€§çš„æ•°é‡ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›å•èŠ‚ç‚¹æ ‘Rootï¼Œ æ ‡ç­¾=ç¤ºä¾‹ä¸­ç›®æ ‡å±æ€§çš„æœ€å¸¸è§å€¼ã€‚ å¦åˆ™å¼€å§‹ Aâ†æœ€ä½³åˆ†ç±»ç¤ºä¾‹çš„å±æ€§ã€‚ Root = Açš„å†³ç­–æ ‘å±æ€§ å¯¹äºAçš„æ¯ä¸ªå¯èƒ½çš„å€¼_v __i_ï¼Œ åœ¨Rootä¸‹æ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„æ ‘åˆ†æ”¯ï¼Œå¯¹åº”äºæµ‹è¯•A = _v __i_ã€‚ è®©ä¾‹å­ï¼ˆ_v __i_ï¼‰æˆä¸ºA çš„å€¼ä¸º_v __i_çš„ä¾‹å­çš„å­é›† å¦‚æœç¤ºä¾‹ï¼ˆ_v __i_ï¼‰ä¸ºç©º ç„¶ååœ¨è¿™ä¸ªæ–°åˆ†æ”¯ä¸‹é¢æ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªæ ‡ç­¾=æœ€å¸¸è§ç›®æ ‡å€¼çš„å¶èŠ‚ç‚¹ å¦åˆ™ï¼Œåœ¨è¿™ä¸ªæ–°åˆ†æ”¯ä¸‹é¢æ·»åŠ å­æ ‘ID3ï¼ˆExamplesï¼ˆ_v __i_ï¼‰ï¼ŒTarget_Attributeï¼ŒAttributes - {A}ï¼‰ ç»“æŸ è¿”å›æ ¹ åˆ’åˆ†æ•°æ®é›†çš„å¤§åŸåˆ™ï¼šå°†æ— åºçš„æ•°æ®å˜å¾—æ›´åŠ æœ‰åºã€‚ åœ¨åˆ’åˆ†æ•°æ®é›†ä¹‹å‰ä¹‹åä¿¡æ¯å‘ç”Ÿçš„å˜åŒ–ç§°ä¸ºä¿¡æ¯å¢ç›Šã€‚å¯¹äºç‰¹å¾å€¼çš„é€‰æ‹©å½“å‰æ˜¯ä¿¡æ¯å¢ç›Šæœ€é«˜çš„ç‰¹å¾å€¼æ˜¯æœ€å¥½çš„ç‰¹å¾å€¼ã€‚ ç†µå®šä¹‰ä¸ºï¼šä¿¡æ¯çš„æœŸæœ›å€¼ã€‚ è®¡ç®—ç»™å®šæ•°æ®é›†çš„ç†µï¼š

import math
import operator

#è®¡ç®—ç»™å®šæ•°æ®é›†çš„ç†µ
def calcShannonEnt(dataSet):
numEntries = len(dataSet) #å¾—åˆ°æ•°æ®é›†ä¸­æ•°æ®çš„ä¸ªæ•°
#ä¸ºæ‰€æœ‰å¯èƒ½åˆ†ç±»åˆ›å»ºå­—å…¸
labelCounts = {} #åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªç©ºçš„å­—å…¸
for featVec in dataSet: #éå†æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°æ®
currentLabel = featVec[-1] #å¾—åˆ°è¯¥æ•°æ®æœ€åä¸€åˆ—çš„å€¼ä½œä¸ºé”®å€¼
if currentLabel not in labelCounts.keys(): #å¦‚æœè¯¥é”®å€¼ä¸åœ¨å·²æœ‰çš„å­—å…¸é”®å€¼ä¸­
labelCounts[currentLabel] = 0 #åˆ™æ‹“å±•å­—å…¸å¹¶å°†å½“å‰é”®å€¼åŠ å…¥å­—å…¸
labelCounts[currentLabel] += 1 #è®°å½•æ¯ä¸ªé”®å€¼å‡ºç°çš„æ¬¡æ•°
shannonEnt = 0.0 #åˆå§‹åŒ–æ¦‚ç‡
for key in labelCounts: #éå†å­—å…¸ä¸­çš„é”®å€¼
prob = float(labelCounts[key]) / numEntries #è®¡ç®—åˆæ­¥è¯¥é”®å€¼å‡ºç°æ¬¡æ•°æ‰€å çš„æ¦‚ç‡
shannonEnt -= prob * math.log(prob,2) #ç”¨ä¸Šé¢çš„æ¦‚ç‡è®¡ç®—æœ¬æ¬¡çš„ç†µ
return shannonEnt #è¿”å›æœ€ç»ˆç†µ

ç®€å•çš„åº”ç”¨ï¼š å…ˆåˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªç®€å•çš„æ•°æ® åœ¨ä»¥åçš„å®éªŒä¸­ä¼šä½¿ç”¨å¤§é‡çš„æ•°æ®è¿™é‡Œè‡ªå·±å…ˆæ„å»ºä¸€ä¸ªç®€å•çš„ï¼š ä½¿ç”¨ï¼š ç»“æœï¼š ) ç†µè¶Šé«˜ï¼Œåˆ™æ··åˆçš„æ•°æ®ä¹Ÿè¶Šå¤šã€‚ è®¡ç®—ç†µçš„å€¼ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸ºäº†ä»¥åæ‰¾åˆ°æœ€ä¼˜åˆ’åˆ†æ•°æ®é›†åšå‡†å¤‡ã€‚ é€‰æ‹©æœ€å¥½çš„æ•°æ®é›†åˆ’åˆ†æ–¹å¼ï¼š

#é€‰æ‹©æœ€å¥½çš„æ•°æ®é›†åˆ’åˆ†æ–¹å¼
def chooseBestFeatureToSplit(dataSet):
#å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨çš„è¦æ±‚æ˜¯ï¼šæ•°æ®å¿…é¡»æ˜¯ä¸€ç§ç”±åˆ—è¡¨å…ƒç´ ç»„æˆçš„åˆ—è¡¨ï¼Œè€Œä¸”æ‰€æœ‰çš„åˆ—è¡¨å…ƒç´ éƒ½è¦å…·æœ‰ç›¸åŒçš„æ•°æ®é•¿åº¦
#æ•°æ®çš„æœ€åä¸€åˆ—æˆ–è€…æ¯ä¸ªå®ä¾‹çš„æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ æ˜¯å½“å‰å®ä¾‹çš„ç±»åˆ«æ ‡ç­¾
numFeatures = len(dataSet[0]) - 1 #è¿™é‡Œæ“ä½œçš„ç›®çš„æ˜¯ å¾—åˆ°[[0,1,2,3],[0,1,2,3]] å››åˆ—-1 å¾—åˆ°å­åˆ—è¡¨ä¸­é™¤æ ‡ç­¾ä¹‹å¤–çš„ç‰¹å¾å€¼çš„æ€»åˆ—æ•°
baseEntropy = calcShannonEnt(dataSet) #è®¡ç®—æ•´ä¸ªæ•°æ®é›†çš„ç†µ
bestInfoGain = 0.0 #åˆå§‹åŒ–æœ€å¥½ä¿¡æ¯æ”¶ç›Š
bestFeature = -1 #åˆå§‹åŒ–æœ€å¥½ä¿¡æ¯æ”¶å…¥çš„å¯¹åº”ç‰¹å¾å€¼çš„åœ¨æ•°æ®é›†ä¸­çš„ä½ç½® [[0,1,2]] è‹¥è¿”å›0 åˆ™ä»£è¡¨ç¬¬0ä¸ªç‰¹å¾å€¼æ˜¯ç”¨æ¥åˆ’åˆ†æ•°æ®é›†æœ€å¥½çš„ç‰¹å¾
#åˆ›å»ºå”¯ä¸€çš„åˆ†ç±»æ ‡ç­¾
for i in range(numFeatures):
featList = [example[i] for example in dataSet] #è®¿é—®æ¯ä¸ªåˆ—è¡¨çš„å­åˆ—è¡¨ ä¸­çš„é™¤æ ‡ç­¾ä¹‹å¤–çš„åœ¨åŒä¸€ä½ç½®ä¸Šçš„ç‰¹å¾å€¼å¹¶å°†å®ƒä»¬ç»„æˆä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„åˆ—è¡¨
uniqueVals = set(featList) #è¿™é‡Œä½¿ç”¨setï¼ˆï¼‰åˆ›å»ºè¯¥åˆ—è¡¨ç‰¹å¾å€¼çš„æ— åºä¸é‡å¤çš„é›†åˆ è¿™é‡Œå¾—åˆ°çš„æ˜¯æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªå­åˆ—è¡¨å¯¹åº”åˆ—ä¸Šçš„ç‰¹å¾å€¼çš„ä¸é‡å¤æ— åºé›†åˆ
#è®¡ç®—æŒ‰ç…§ç¬¬iåˆ—ç‰¹å¾å€¼åˆ’åˆ†çš„æ•°æ®é›†çš„ä¿¡æ¯ç†µ
newEntropy = 0.0 #åˆå§‹åŒ–
for value in uniqueVals: #éå†ä¸Šé¢åˆ›å»ºçš„æ— åºä¸é‡å¤ç‰¹å¾å€¼é›†åˆ ç›®çš„æ˜¯å¾—åˆ°åˆ†åˆ«æŒ‰ç…§åœ¨è¯¥åˆ—ä¸Šä¸åŒçš„ç‰¹å¾å€¼æ‰€åˆ’åˆ†å¾—åˆ°çš„æ•°æ®é›†ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”è®¡ç®—è¯¥ç§åˆ’åˆ†çš„ç†µ
subDataSet = splitDataSet(dataSet,i,value) #å¾—åˆ°è¯¥æ•°æ®é›†å¯¹äºè¯¥ç‰¹å¾å€¼çš„åˆ’åˆ†
prob = len(subDataSet)/float(len(dataSet)) #è®¡ç®—è¯¥æ•°æ®é›†åˆ’åˆ†æ–¹å¼åœ¨åŸæ•°æ®é›†ä¸­çš„æ‰€å æ¯”
newEntropy += prob * calcShannonEnt(subDataSet) #å¾—åˆ°æ–°çš„ä¿¡æ¯å¢ç›Š = æ‰€å æ¯”*æ•°æ®é›†æ–°åˆ’åˆ†æ–¹å¼çš„ç†µ
#è®¡ç®—æœ€å¥½çš„ä¿¡æ¯æ”¶å…¥
infoGain = baseEntropy - newEntropy
if(infoGain > bestInfoGain): #å¦‚æœnumfaetureså¤§äº1 åˆ™è¿›è¡Œå¤šåˆ—ç‰¹å¾å€¼éƒ½è¿›è¡Œåˆ’åˆ† å¾—åˆ°æ•°æ®ä¾æ¬¡åœ¨è¿™é‡Œæ¯”è¾ƒ ä¿ç•™ä¸‹æœ€å¥½çš„
bestInfoGain = infoGain #è·å¾—æœ€å¥½çš„ä¿¡æ¯æ”¶å…¥
bestFeature = i #å¾—åˆ°æœ€å¥½ä¿¡æ¯æ”¶å…¥ä½ç½®å¯¹åº”ç‰¹å¾å€¼çš„ä½ç½®
return bestFeature #è¿”å›çš„æ˜¯æŒ‰ç…§ç¬¬å‡ åˆ—åˆ’åˆ†å¾—åˆ°çš„æ•°æ®é›†æœ€å¥½ ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä½ çœ‹æˆæ‰¾åˆ°æ ‘ä¸Šçš„ä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹

ä¸¾ä¾‹è§£é‡Šï¼š ) å¯¹äºè¿™ä¸ªåˆ—è¡¨ä¼šå…ˆéå†ç¬¬ä¸€åˆ—æ‰€æœ‰å…ƒç´ [1,1,1,0,0,0] æ˜¯åœ¨ä»£ç çš„48è¡Œåˆ°57è¡Œå®ç°çš„ é€šè¿‡setï¼ˆï¼‰ ä¼šå¾—åˆ°ä¸é‡å¤æ— åºçš„åˆ—è¡¨[1,0]æˆ–è€…[0,1] æ˜¯åœ¨ä»£ç å¾—58è¡Œå®ç°çš„ ç„¶åä¾æ¬¡æ ¹æ®å…¶ä¸­æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªç‰¹å¾å€¼ä»¥åŠåˆ—æ ‡ è¿›è¡Œåˆ’åˆ†åœ¨ä»£ç çš„62è¡Œå®ç°çš„ å‰©ä¸‹çš„å°±æ˜¯è¿›è¡Œæ•°æ®ä¹‹é—´æ“ä½œ ä¸ºçš„æ˜¯è¿›è¡Œæœ€ä¼˜è§£çš„é€‰æ‹© 63è¡Œåˆ°70è¡Œ psï¼šéå†å®Œè¿™ä¸€åˆ—ä¼šè¿›è¡Œä¸‹ä¸€åˆ—[1,1,0,1,1,1]çš„éå†é‡å¤ä¸Šé¢æ“ä½œï¼Œå¦‚æœæœ‰æ›´å¤šåˆ—åˆ™ç»§ç»­è¿›è¡Œã€‚ Endï¼

A = np.sqrt(grad_x**2 + grad_y**2 + 1.) uni_x = grad_x / A uni_y = grad_y / A uni_z = 1. / A vec_e1 = np.pi / 2.2 #å…‰æºçš„ä¿¯è§†è§’åº¦ï¼Œå¼§åº¦å€¼ vec_az = np.pi / 4 #å…‰æºçš„æ–¹ä½è§’åº¦ï¼Œå¼§åº¦å€¼ dx = np.cos(vec_e1) * np.cos(vec_az) #å…‰æºå¯¹xè½´çš„å½±å“ dy = np.cos(vec_e1) * np.sin(vec_az) #å…‰æºå¯¹yè½´çš„å½±å“ dz = np.sin(vec_e1) #å…‰æºå¯¹zçš„å½±å“ b = 255 * (dx * uni_x + dy * uni_y + dz * uni_z) #å…‰æºå½’ä¸€åŒ– b = b.clip(0,255) im = Image.fromarray(b.astype(â€˜uint8â€™)) #é‡æ„å›¾åƒ im.save(â€˜F:/b.jpgâ€™) åŸå›¾ï¼š ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯æ•ˆæœå›¾ï¼š

çŸ¥åç‰©ç†å­¦å®¶å²è’‚èŠ¬Â·éœé‡‘ï¼ˆStephen Hawkingï¼‰å»ä¸–ï¼Œäº«å¹´76å²ã€‚çˆ±å› æ–¯å¦ç”Ÿæ—¥è¿™å¤©ï¼Œéœé‡‘èµ°äº†ã€‚ä»–å‡ºç”Ÿçš„é‚£å¤©ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¼½åˆ©ç•¥å»ä¸–çš„æ—¥å­ã€‚

BBCæ–°é—»ä¸Šçš„æŠ¥é“ï¼š

World renowned physicist Stephen Hawking has died at the age of 76.

He died peacefully in his home in Cambridge in the early hours of Wednesday, his family said. He was known for his work with black holes and relativity, and wrote several popular science books including A Brief History of Time. â€œWe are deeply saddened that our beloved father passed away today,â€ his children said. At the age of 22 Stephen Hawking was given only a few years to live after being diagnosed with a rare form of motor neurone disease.

import tkinter import threading import datetime import time app = tkinter.Tk() app.overrideredirect(True) #ä¸æ˜¾ç¤ºæ ‡é¢˜æ  app.attributes(â€˜-alphaâ€™, 0.9) #åŠé€æ˜ app.attributes(â€˜-topmostâ€™, 1) #æ€»æ˜¯åœ¨é¡¶ç«¯ app.geometry(â€˜110x25+100+100â€™) #åˆå§‹å¤§å°ä¸ä½ç½® labelDateTime = tkinter.Label(app) labelDateTime.pack(fill=tkinter.BOTH, expand=tkinter.YES) labelDateTime.configure(bg = â€˜grayâ€™) X = tkinter.IntVar(value=0) #è®°å½•é¼ æ ‡å·¦é”®æŒ‰ä¸‹çš„ä½ç½® Y = tkinter.IntVar(value=0) canMove = tkinter.IntVar(value=0) #çª—å£æ˜¯å¦å¯æ‹–åŠ¨ still = tkinter.IntVar(value=1) #æ˜¯å¦ä»åœ¨è¿è¡Œ def onLeftButtonDown(event): app.attributes(â€˜-alphaâ€™, 0.4) #å¼€å§‹æ‹–åŠ¨æ—¶å¢åŠ é€æ˜åº¦ X.set(event.x) #é¼ æ ‡å·¦é”®æŒ‰ä¸‹ï¼Œè®°å½•å½“å‰ä½ç½® Y.set(event.y) canMove.set(1) #å¹¶æ ‡è®°çª—å£å¯æ‹–åŠ¨ labelDateTime.bind(â€˜â€˜, onLeftButtonDown) def onLeftButtonUp(event): app.attributes(â€˜-alphaâ€™, 0.9) #åœæ­¢æ‹–åŠ¨æ—¶æ¢å¤é€æ˜åº¦ canMove.set(0) #é¼ æ ‡å·¦é”®æŠ¬èµ·ï¼Œæ ‡è®°çª—å£ä¸å¯æ‹–åŠ¨ labelDateTime.bind(â€˜â€˜, onLeftButtonUp) def onLeftButtonMove(event): if canMove.get()==0: return newX = app.winfo_x()+(event.x-X.get()) newY = app.winfo_y()+(event.y-Y.get()) g = â€˜110x25+â€™+str(newX)+â€™+â€™+str(newY) app.geometry(g) #ä¿®æ”¹çª—å£çš„ä½ç½® labelDateTime.bind(â€˜â€˜, onLeftButtonMove) def onRightButtonDown(event): still.set(0) t.join(0.2) app.destroy() #å…³é—­çª—å£ labelDateTime.bind(â€˜â€˜, onRightButtonDown) def nowDateTime(): while still.get()==1: now = datetime.datetime.now() s = str(now.year)+â€™-â€˜+str(now.month)+â€™-â€˜+str(now.day)+â€™ â€˜ s = s+str(now.hour)+â€™:â€™+str(now.minute)+â€™:â€™+str(now.second) labelDateTime[â€˜textâ€™] = s #æ˜¾ç¤ºå½“å‰æ—¶é—´ time.sleep(0.2) t = threading.Thread(target=nowDateTime) t.daemon = True t.start() app.mainloop()
